item.title: A Sentimental Analysis of Tolstoy
item.description: Introduction Goal: Create a graph showing sentiment analysis of three Tolstoy novels over his career. Inspired by Julia Silge’s sentiment analysis of Jane Austen novels. Hypothesis: Tolstoy’s last novel, Resurrection, will have a different sentiment pattern than his others. Description of the Data Full text of three novels by Leo Tolstoy: Childhood (1852), translated into English by C.J. Hogarth Anna Karenina (1877), translated into English by Constance Garnett Resurrection (1899), translated into English by Mrs.
